thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com
thread.title: Colleen Gallagher Higgins
thread.title_full: Chewy.com reviewed by Colleen Gallagher Higgins

author: Colleen Gallagher Higgins
title: Colleen Gallagher Higgins
text: I have been a Chewy.com customer for a number of months. They have always delivered on time and the correct, complete order. Prices are better then my local pet store and I don't have to lug this stuff around. My dogs LOVE to see the Chewy box. I even received a handwritten Christmas card. If I had not already been really impressed and happy with Chewy.com my local dog rescue spoke about someone who had ordered an incorrect item and when they contact Chewy.com to exchange it they were told to donate the item to the rescue.
